divs: sighting detailslast night, october 24th, myself and some friends decided to carve pumpkins and watch the good old classic british horror film 'shaun of the dead'... at around 11:10pm the conversation moved outside as some of us smoke, so we all stepped out onto the balcony. one of us pointed into the night sky and said - ..."wtf is that!?"... we looked and the three of us who were outside all saw it glide across the sky for a good 30 seconds maybe... from left to right. through the la smog layer, against the clear starry night we could see a jumbo-jet sized, silent, triangle\delta-shaped\boomerang with lights underneath it... faint lights, at least 10 or so with one larger light at the front... none of them flashing - which by law you have to have the flashing beacons... this did not... heading in a southerly direction... someone at lax must have painted that or seen it from a plane... surely!?!? we called the whiteman air base and they confirmed they'd seen it also and that they had received three calls already. this was no blimp or plane - it appeared to be fairly high up - but not of the 35k height of commercial air traffic... moving just as fast though... appeared to glide rapidly... silent... no flashing lights.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around October 24th 2012
Summary: Triangle/Boomerang/Delta-Shape of 10 or more lights... silent gliding over Hollywood. This was no blimp or plane!
